attributes.action: Re-Open Honington Airfield as a Civil Airfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RAF Honington is a historic airfield in Suffolk. It is used by the RAF but unfortunately not for flying. I would really like to see Civil Flying at Honington. This would be very popular with Aviation Entusiasts and also many people in the local area. It would boost tourism in this area and also bring a lot of money in to the area.
